row.process:
@echo off !:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
!Logging Params :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Service Name" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_SERVICE# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Host" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_HOST# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Port" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_PORT# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "SQL Username" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_USER# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Use DB Admin Privileges" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_USE_ADMIN_PRIV# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Full path to SQLPlus"
:SET &SQLPLUS_FULL_PATH# = &UC4RB_DB_SQLPLUS_FULL_PATH# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &SQLPLUS_FULL_PATH#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Command" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DB_COMMAND#
set /a errors=0 > nul :SET &UC4RB_PV_ERRORS# = 0
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Service Name" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_DB_SERVICE# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Host" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_DB_HOST# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Port" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_DB_PORT# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "SQL Username" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_DB_USER# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Use DB Admin Privileges" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_DB_USE_ADMIN_PRIV# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Full path to SQLPlus" :SET &SQLPLUS_FULL_PATH# = &UC4RB_DB_SQLPLUS_FULL_PATH# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &SQLPLUS_FULL_PATH#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Command" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_DB_COMMAND#
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH ! decrypt password :SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP#="&UC4RB_DB_PASS#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD :SET &UC4RB_DB_PASS# = "%UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD%"
!validate sqlplus path :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_DB_SQLPLUS_FULL_PATH# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_WINDOWS_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_DB_SQLPLUS_FULL_PATH# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:SET &POS# = STR_FIND_REVERSE(&UC4RB_DB_SQLPLUS_FULL_PATH#,"\\") :IF &POS# > 0 : SET &POS# = &POS# + 1 : SET &SQLPLUS_PATH# = SUBSTR(&UC4RB_DB_SQLPLUS_FULL_PATH#,1,&POS#) : SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &SQLPLUS_PATH# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_DB.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_TYPE_CMD@WINDOWS if %EXIST% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Full path to SQLPlus" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Sqlplus execution path &SQLPLUS_PATH# does not exist!" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR.PARAMETER set /a errors=1 >nul ) :ENDIF !validate sql-script file :SET &POS# = STR_FIND(&UC4RB_DB_COMMAND#,"@") :IF &POS# > 0 : SET &POS# = &POS# + 1 : SET &SCRIPT_FILE# = SUBSTR(&UC4RB_DB_COMMAND#,&POS#) : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &SCRIPT_FILE# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_WINDOWS_STYLE : SET &SCRIPT_FILE# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# : SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &SCRIPT_FILE# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_DB.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_TYPE_CMD@WINDOWS if %EXIST% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Sql-script file" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Sql-script file &SCRIPT_FILE# does not exist!" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR.PARAMETER set /a errors=2 >nul ) :ENDIF
! Check EXT: in value :IF &UC4RB_PV_ERRORS# = 100 set retcode=100 goto :retcode :ENDIF
!stop execution if validation errors occurred if %errors% GTR 0 ( set retcode=1 goto :retcode )
! Start execution :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_DB.PRV.INCLUDE.EXEC_SQLPLUS :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS

row.post_process: :SET &HND1# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"*ORA-*","COL=DELIMITER", "DELIMITER=*: *")) :PROCESS &HND1# : SET &STATUS_CODE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND1#,1) : SET &STATUS_CODE# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&STATUS_CODE#, "SQL>", "") : SET &STATUS_CODE# = STR_TRIM(&STATUS_CODE#) : PSET &UC4RB_OUT_ORCL_STATUS_CODE# = &STATUS_CODE# : PSET &UC4RB_OUT_ORCL_MESSAGE_DESCR# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND1#,2) : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=1 : ENDPROCESS :SET &HND2# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"*SP2-*","COL=DELIMITER", "DELIMITER=*: *")) :PROCESS &HND2# : SET &STATUS_CODE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND2#,1) : SET &STATUS_CODE# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&STATUS_CODE#, "SQL>", "") : SET &STATUS_CODE# = STR_TRIM(&STATUS_CODE#) : PSET &UC4RB_OUT_ORCL_STATUS_CODE# = &STATUS_CODE# : PSET &UC4RB_OUT_ORCL_MESSAGE_DESCR# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND2#,2) : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=1 :ENDPROCESS
